text: Taŵechete akusigalila munyuma pandema jatim’bigule kuja kuchipanje chakupalagula (cha ku Khaibara) kuti nkachijigale: “Tulekaani tunkuuye.” Akusaka agalawusye maloŵe ga Allah. Jilani: “Nganim’ba ntukuyiye. Mwele ni muŵaŵechetele kalape Allah.” Basi ŵanganyao tajile: “(Ngwamba), nambo nkututendela litima.” (Ngwamba), nambo aŵele akakumanyilila ikaŵeje panandipe
